title: Union Strikes To Challenge Hypocrisy
itunes:title: Union Strikes To Challenge Hypocrisy
description:
Host Caroline Hepker speaks to Terry Pullinger, Deputy General Secretary (Postal) of the Communications workers union, who defends strike action in the face of a minimal wage offer saying, "If we do nothing that's all you're getting." Plus on the cost of living crisis, Lalitha Try from the Resolution Foundation joins to discuss new research on how decades of income stagnation has exposed vulnerable households.
